sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: This pass expects an initialized camera. It disables all the lights, apply transformations for lights following the camera, and turn on the enables lights.
To create an instance of class vtkLightsPass, simply invoke its constructor as follows obj = vtkLightsPass
